best_gem_comment: Gem of a class, but also super interesting if you apply yourself! It turned out that section was non–mandatory (not in the grade according to the syllabus). Assignments were super light, 4 1–page papers, take–home midterm and final exams with study guides provided (so you already knew all the questions ahead of time), and a final 4–5 page paper!
best_gem_comment_short: Gem of a class, but also super interesting if you apply yourself!
